3.3 DUIM-Extended-Geometry Module

draw-design

Generic function

Summary

Draws a design on a drawing surface.

Signature

draw-design drawable design => ()

Arguments

drawable
An instance of type type-union(<sheet>, <medium>).

design
A <region> to draw.

Values

None.

Library

duim-extended-geometry

Module

duim-extended-geometry

Description

Draws design on the sheet medium drawable.

Functional Developer Library Reference: DUIM - 3 Dec 1998
